typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_opportunityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		parentaccountid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		parentaccountid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
source(output(
		SK_systemusermanagerid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_systemusermanagerid as string,
		fullname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG2
STG derive(DWHHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(parentaccountid)),upper(toString(orignatingleadid)),toString(purchasetimeframe),toString(purchasetimeframe),toString(status),toString(opportunityratingcode),upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(modifiedon))) ~> STGHASH
STGHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_opportunityid == DWH@SK_opportunityid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	DWH@HASHKEY!=STG@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		parentaccountid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		parentaccountid as integer,
		orignatingleadid as integer,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_systemuserid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
